title: Poppy seed fruit salad
ingredients: ['575g pineapple chunks - drained with juice reserved', '1 orange, peeled and segmented', '1 kiwi - peeled, halved and sliced', '150g seedless grapes', '175g quartered strawberries', '1/4 teaspoon grated lime zest', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 teaspoon poppy seeds']
